member.name: F:Inflexion2.Logging.NetLog.NLogLogger.logger
member.summary: NLog logger that this adapter wraps

member.name: F:Inflexion2.Logging.NetLog.NLogLogger.declaringType
member.summary: Used to exclude Inflexion2.Logging from call site information

member.name: M:Inflexion2.Logging.NetLog.NLogLogger.#ctor(NLog.Logger)
member.summary: Wrap an instance of an NLog logger

member.name: M:Inflexion2.Logging.NetLog.NLogLogger.Log(Inflexion2.Logging.LogEntry)
member.summary: Log to the wrapped NLog logger

member.name: M:Inflexion2.Logging.NetLog.NLogLogger.MapLogLevel(Inflexion2.Logging.LogLevel)
member.summary: Maps an Inflexion2.Logging log level to an NLog log level
member.remarks: NLog has log levels that correspond to the Inflexion2.Logging log levels, so this is a 1:1 mapping
member.param: Inflexion2.Logging log level to be mapped
